title: He Got Me: Tyson
description: During Veronica's high school years, Tyson was her biggest crush. Now that she's moved on, it's open game.Tyson is every girl’s dream; cute, cocky, and the university's best b-ball player, Ronnie has waited in line for her chance and couldn't believe that she caught Tyson's eye when he fell out with one of the girls at her old school.Now that she's in college, it doesn’t matter; she has the freedom to do what she wants. She knows more about Tyson that anyone including Ms. B.Now, Tyson just have to give in to Ronnie's little trap, or will her appetite prove too much for him?
author: Just Bae
